dailyChallenges: 1. Write down three things you're grateful for.
2. Reflect on a recent emotional trigger.
3. Do something today that brings you joy.
4. Practice deep breathing for 5 minutes.
5. Talk to someone about how you really feel.
6. Say no to something that drains you.
7. Identify one limiting belief you have.
8. Let go of a small grudge today.
9. Give yourself a compliment out loud.
10. Journal about your emotions for 10 minutes.
title: Emotional Awareness Starter
description: Begin building emotional self-awareness with gentle, reflective prompts.

dailyChallenges: 1. Sit with an uncomfortable feeling for 5 minutes.
2. Identify a boundary you need to enforce.
3. Write a forgiveness letter (you don't need to send it).
4. Reflect on a past challenge and what you learned.
5. Express gratitude to someone from your past.
6. Visualize yourself succeeding emotionally.
7. Share a story from your childhood with someone.
8. Avoid complaining for a whole day.
9. Create a calming playlist.
10. Practice mirror affirmations.
title: Emotional Resilience Growth
description: Build inner strength and emotional stability one day at a time.

dailyChallenges: 1. Write about your current emotional state.
2. Identify a fear and challenge it mentally.
3. Check in with yourself every 2 hours.
4. Do something creative to express an emotion.
5. Speak kindly to yourself all day.
6. Set an emotional intention for the day.
7. Reflect on how you handle criticism.
8. Choose to let something go today.
9. Write a positive affirmation and say it aloud.
10. Hug someone for 10 seconds.
title: Healing Through Reflection
description: Nurture your emotional health with small acts of vulnerability and care.
